rel_tgt: Mu Yanjun's eyes suddenly widened, and his hand swiftly slapped towards the old quack doctor's head.
With this back and forth, Mu Yanjun couldn't hold on any longer and passed out from dizziness.

src: 糟老头见他醒了，“我给你扎针呢，你心神俱衰，不过给你养养，你就该去见阎王。”
ref: The rotten old man saw he was awake, “I gave you acupuncture, your heart was in decline, but I gave you treatment. Otherwise, you would go to see King Yama.”
hyp: The old quack doctor saw him wake up, "I gave you an injection, but your spirit is weakened. I'll give you some care, and then you should go meet the King of Hell."
rel_src: 结果糟老头手法如电，瞬间一针扎入他的颈部。
糟老头摸摸自己的头，“差点就死了，不过估计我也活不了多久，他醒来后没有疯就算好的。”
rel_tgt: As a result, the old quack doctor's hands moved like lightning, and a needle instantly pierced into his neck.
The old quack doctor touched his head, "I almost died, but I probably won't live much longer. As long as he wakes up without going crazy, that's considered good."

src: 慕言君眼神阴沉下去，脸色苍白憔悴，却煞气十足，让人看了不寒而栗。
ref: Mu Yanjun eyes were dark. His face was pale, but full of anger, enough to make others shudder.
hyp: Mu Yanjun's eyes darkened, his face pale and haggard, yet exuding a chilling aura that made people shudder.
rel_src: 而慕言君的状态简直就是悲入心神，五脏六腑统统出现问题。
慕言君仅仅睡了两个时辰，眼睛就睁开。
rel_tgt: And Mu Yanjun's condition is simply heart-wrenching, with all his internal organs experiencing issues.
Mu Yanjun only slept for two hours before opening his eyes.

src: 糟老头又给他扎了一针，“本来不想救你的，毕竟你这样的人心肠歹毒无比，救活了你指不定这天下要乱成什么样子。”
ref: The old man pierced him with another needle, “I didn’t want to save you, after all, your heart is incomparably poisonous. To save someone like you today, wouldn’t it mean that the world will be messed up.”
hyp: The old quack doctor gave him another injection, "I didn't want to save you originally, after all, someone as cruel and malicious as you, if I save you, who knows how chaotic the world will become."
rel_src: 糟老头声音低了下去，“就是我又该医治另一个人了……”
糟老头叹气，“难怪我师傅说，卖红薯都不能当神医，人人都将我当神了，就是神也没法让一个想死的人活下去啊。”
rel_tgt: The old quack doctor's voice lowered, "It seems I have to treat another person again..."

The old quack doctor sighed, "No wonder my master used to say, even selling sweet potatoes can't be considered a divine doctor. Everyone treats me like a god, but even a god can't make someone who wants to die stay alive."

src: 慕言君声音轻柔而诡异，“松开我。”
ref: Mu Yanjun’s voice was soft and strange, “Let me go.”
hyp: Mu Yanjun's voice was soft and eerie, "Let go of me."

糟老头摸摸自己的头，“差点就死了，不过估计我也活不了多久，他醒来后没有疯就算好的。”

The old quack doctor touched his head, "I almost died, but I probably won't live much longer. As long as he wakes up without going crazy, that's considered good."

src: 糟老头摇头，“这可不行，我救不活你的心尖人，救了你也算是赔偿了。”
ref: The old man shook his head, “This I can not, I couldn’t save the little person in your heart. Saving you is compensation.”
hyp: The old quack doctor shook his head, "I can't save the person in your heart, saving you will be considered compensation."

ref: Mu Yanjun suddenly began to smile bitterly, “You can’t pay, how could it be compensated, even if you saved all the world, it couldn’t repay one hair of hers.”
